chunk_text: Part 1: Compute homography and perform point projections between a checkerboard scene and image coordinates. 2. Part 2: Place a teapot on a target object in 19 images, using camera and scene geometry. Below, I describe my progress, the methods I used, and the issues I faced. I tried different approaches, some of which were not successful. I hope this shows my effort. Part 1: Homography Computation 1.1 Homography Calculation Function I wrote a C# class named HomographyCalculator to calculate the homography matrix.
